languages.text: "Не самая распространенная реакция на новость о моем постоянном близком присутствии. Впрочем, вы правы — если моей работе не препятствуют, я предпочитаю отвечать услугой на услугу".

traits.locale_text: "Не самая распространенная реакция на новость о моем постоянном близком присутствии. Впрочем, вы правы — если моей работе не препятствуют, я предпочитаю отвечать услугой на услугу".

languages.text: "Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."
languages.original_text: "Не самая распространенная реакция на новость о моем постоянном близком присутствии. Впрочем, вы правы — если моей работе не препятствуют, я предпочитаю отвечать услугой на услугу".

traits.locale_text: "Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though — if no one stands in the way of my work, I prefer doing a favor in kind."
"Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though — if no one stands in the way of my work, I prefer doing a favor in kind."

"Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

"Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

"Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

languages.text: 「常に監視の目が光るというのに、ずいぶん嬉しそうだな。だが、間違いではない。好意は同等のものでお返しする主義なんでね。我の仕事に支障がないように手を貸していただければ、こちらもあなたに手を貸そう」
languages.original_text: "Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

traits.locale_text: 「常に監視の目が光るというのに、ずいぶん嬉しそうだな。だが、間違いではない。好意は同等のものでお返しする主義なんでね。我の仕事に支障がないように手を貸していただければ、こちらもあなたに手を貸そう」

languages.text: “你意识到我会时时刻刻地盯着你，而你的反应却着实令人出乎意料。不过你说得没错，我很乐意以德报德。只要你帮助我，确保我的工作不受阻碍，我也会反过来帮助你。”
languages.original_text: "Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

traits.locale_text: “你意识到我会时时刻刻地盯着你，而你的反应却着实令人出乎意料。不过你说得没错，我很乐意以德报德。只要你帮助我，确保我的工作不受阻碍，我也会反过来帮助你。”

languages.text: «No es la respuesta más común a la noticia de que {mf|le tendré vigilado|la tendré vigilada}. Pero no se equivoca. Prefiero devolver los favores en especies: ayúdeme a que mi trabajo no enfrente trabas y yo le prestaré mi ayuda a cambio».
languages.original_text: "Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

traits.locale_text: «No es la respuesta más común a la noticia de que {mf|le tendré vigilado|la tendré vigilada}. Pero no se equivoca. Prefiero devolver los favores en especies: ayúdeme a que mi trabajo no enfrente trabas y yo le prestaré mi ayuda a cambio».

languages.text: « Une réponse plutôt décalée, pour une personne qui vient d'apprendre qu'elle va m'avoir sur le dos jusqu'à nouvel ordre... mais vous n'avez pas tort. Quand on me rend service, je rends toujours la pareille : aidez-moi en facilitant mon travail, et je vous aiderai en retour. »
languages.original_text: "Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

traits.locale_text: « Une réponse plutôt décalée, pour une personne qui vient d'apprendre qu'elle va m'avoir sur le dos jusqu'à nouvel ordre... mais vous n'avez pas tort. Quand on me rend service, je rends toujours la pareille : aidez-moi en facilitant mon travail, et je vous aiderai en retour. »

languages.text: "Nicht gerade die häufigste Reaktion auf die Nachricht, dass ich Euch ständig im Genick sitzen werde. Aber Ihr habt nicht unrecht. Ich ziehe es vor, Gefallen zurückzuzahlen – unterstützt mich, damit ich ungestört arbeiten kann, dann unterstütze ich Euch auch."
languages.original_text: "Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht gerade die häufigste Reaktion auf die Nachricht, dass ich Euch ständig im Genick sitzen werde. Aber Ihr habt nicht unrecht. Ich ziehe es vor, Gefallen zurückzuzahlen – unterstützt mich, damit ich ungestört arbeiten kann, dann unterstütze ich Euch auch."

languages.text: "Ensenden ayrılmayacağımı duyduğunda vermeni beklediğim tepki bu değildi. Fakat haksız değilsin. İyiliğin karşılığını iyilikle veririm. İşimin engelle karşılaşmadan tamamlanmasına yardımcı olursan ben de senden yardımımı esirgemem."
languages.original_text: "Not the most common response to the news that I will be constantly breathing down your neck. You aren't wrong, though. I prefer to repay favours in kind — assist me by ensuring that my work is unobstructed, and I will assist you in return."

traits.locale_text: "Ensenden hiç ayrılmayacağımı duyduğunda vereceğin son tepki bu olmalıydı. Fakat haksız değilsin. İyiliğin karşılığını iyilikle veririm. İşimin sorunsuz bir şekilde tamamlanmasında bana yardımcı olursan karşılığını alırsın."
